subsection.name: About
subsection.p: Josceleton is a Java library to access data sent by the Microsoft Kinect sensors.
" ... it enables users to control and interact, ... through a natural user interface using gestures", from Wikipedia.

table.caption: Video: XBox Kinect OSCeleton showcase (copyright by Tiago Serra).

subsection.p: Technicaly speaking this library relies on a running OSceleton server instance. To be able to talk to this server, the OSC protocol implementation Java OSC is used.
